title: Ava Duvernay Interview and more
itunes:title: Ava Duvernay Interview and more
description:
Friday 3/8- Today on the show we had director Ava Duvernay in the building where she spoke about her new movie a "Wrinkle in Time", being a rapper before, hating the word "moist" and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to another Florida man who blared his horn at the cops despite having arsenal of weapons and drugs. Also, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our women listeners would hire an attractive babysitter. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Friday 3/8- Today on the show we had director Ava Duvernay in the building where she spoke about her new movie a "Wrinkle in Time", being a rapper before, hating the word "moist" and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to another Florida man who blared his horn at the cops despite having arsenal of weapons and drugs. Also, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our women listeners would hire an attractive babysitter.
